msgProcessDetected:
PAMP detected already running Apache and/or MySQL processes. 
In order to avoid conflicts, PAMP will not start. Please stop the conflicting processes and try again.
msgDirectoryNotExisting: The directory does not exist. Start the server at least once
msgDbWipeAsk: Are you sure you want to wipe the database? This action cannot be undone.
msgDbCantClose: Couldn't close the MariaDB server. Please restart the computer.
msgCantDeleteDbData: Couldn't delete the database data. Please check the permissions and try again.
msgDbTimeout: Timed out while waiting for the database to start. Please check the status and try again.
